Display and Share Your Vision From workshops to exhibitions, this app is the perfect platform to showcase artwork in style. Share your process, techniques, and inspirations while connecting with others who appreciate your creative journey. Every piece finds its place to shine in this supportive environment. Download our app now and explore breathtaking art, discover inspiring exhibitions, and engage with a vibrant art community. From learning with an AI art guide to connecting with other artists and sharing your artwork - We have everything you need to thrive in the art world!"

apps.title: DaVinci - Image Generator AI
apps.description: Transform your words and images into stunning AI generated art! All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style - and watch DaVinci AI bring your idea to life in seconds! DaVinci is a state-of-the-art AI Photo Generator app. Using the latest artificial intelligence technology, it can create unique artworks, photos and images based solely on your descriptions. Here are some cool things you can ask DaVinci AI to paint for you: • Digital artworks • Tattoo designs • Signature Generator • Logo designs • Hyper-realistic AI-generated photos • AI-generated avatars of you ... and much more! Key Features ► AI Art Generator Our AI art generator, trained with millions of images from the web, allows you to craft unique and captivating art drawings in seconds. Simply type in your text or upload a photo to start generating AI-generated art. ► Pick from a variety of art styles DaVinci AI Photo Generator offers a variety of art styles to choose from. Experiment with different styles, from cartoon-like pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism, and discover the one that best transforms your vision into stunning AI art. ► Create unique artwork for your home or room. Looking for the perfect artwork for your room or home? Describe your idea to AI Art Generator, and it will craft a one-of-a-kind artwork tailored just for you. If you love the result, you can download it in high resolution and have it printed to proudly display in your home. ► AI Tattoo Generator With DaVinci AI, you can generate unique tattoo designs within seconds. Simply type in your idea, and let our powerful AI art generator work its magic. The AI tattoo generator feature produces amazing and one-of-a-kind tattoo designs. Our tattoo maker can bring your ideas to life and inspire you to create distinctive tattoo designs. ► Signature Generator Looking for the perfect signature creator? DaVinci AI allows you to create, generate, and personalize your signature effortlessly. Whether for business documents, emails, or personal branding, our signature maker lets you craft a stylish and professional signature in seconds. ► Logo Generator – AI-Powered Logo Design Need a logo generator to bring your brand identity to life? DaVinci AI’s logo maker transforms your ideas into stunning logos with just a few clicks. Describe your vision, select a design style, and let AI handle the rest. Whether you're launching a startup or refreshing an existing brand, our intelligent tool ensures you get a high-quality, professional logo in seconds! ► AI Photo Generator The AI Photo Generator feature can produce hyper-realistic, high-resolution photos and images from your prompts. You'll be amazed at how lifelike and realistic the AI-generated photos appear. ► AI Avatar Generator Create extraordinary avatar versions of yourself with the latest artificial intelligence technology. Simply upload your photos, select your desired styles, and watch DaVinci work its magic. Transform into a soccer player, an astronaut, or explore dozens of other styles. With AI Avatar Generator feature the choice is entirely yours. ► Share your Creations & Go Viral If you've created something you love using DaVinci’s powerful AI-art generator, you can directly share your masterpieces from the app to other platforms. Creating AI-generated art has become effortless and readily accessible from mobile devices. Similar to popular tools like Dall-e, Stable Diffusion and AI Mirror, our AI Art Generator is backed by the latest artificial intelligence to transform your written prompts into art. No brushes, pencils, or art supplies are needed to craft stunning art now; only your imagination. Sit back and let DaVinci AI become the artist behind your vision! We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make DaVinci AI better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@davinci.ai Privacy Policy: https://davinci.ai/app-privacy Terms of Use: https://davinci.ai/terms

apps.title: AI Art Generator: Photo to Art
apps.description: AI Gahaku turn your photo into a Renaissance portrait painting. This ai cam are used by over 10 million people around the world. Using AIGahaku’s art filters you can make your photo look as if Warhol pop art, Modigliani oil painting, Picasso, or even Rembrandt himself painted it for you! And with no picture editing or Photoshop skills needed, it’s easy to share your world. - 50+ OF STYLES: You'll find more than 300 art styles in AIGahaku art filter library. AIGahaku has the largest collection of different artistic styles to choose from. Find your favorite one! - Automatically retouches. Improves skin and brings out an atmospheric, natural portrait look. - Get instant results. It's very fast and easy to use. - BUILT FOR SOCIAL: Easily capture and share fun, high-quality photos to your favorite social network. Note for People of Color: We are so sorry that our AI has been trained mostly on portraits of people of European ethnicity. We're planning to fix this soon. AI Gahaku app works like a fully automated pro AI Portrait photo editor. It's also great for avatar generation. You can also check PortraitAI app and AI Gahaku Art website from Tokyo. AIGahaku photo editor is brought to you by AIGahaku(ai-art.tokyo). You must agree to AIGahaku privacy policy: =========================== AIGahaku PRO subscription options: =========================== AIGahaku PRO monthly - $4.99 per month Your AIGahaku PRO subscription will automatically renew 24-hours prior to the end of each term (month or year correspondingly) and your card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time in your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused period of the term. ToonMe Terms of Use: https://ai-art.tokyo/en/terms/ ToonMe Privacy Policy: https://ai-art.tokyo/en/terms/

apps.title: Art of War: Legions
apps.description: A funny game with huge amount of spectacular battles. You will be the commander who leads legions of tiny armies. Accept the challenges of various levels and don’t forget to get extra rewards from bounty tasks! It’s your army, you in charge. *【Exciting Battles】The battle is more like a real dance of war. Hope you can become a glorious commander and have a lot of fun. *【Extra Bounty Tasks】 Those cool bounty tasks will be unlocked once you reach level 14. You can get precious gems by finishing those tasks. But be aware that some of them are really tricky. *【Regular Updates】 We are a young team, but we always strive to improve your game experience and make the game incredible time-killer.We are really happy to receive any feedback from you. If you have problem or questions about the game you can find answer in our FAQ. You can find our FAQ in the help section of the in-game settings or by this link: http://www.armyneedyou.com/support/faq VIP membership subscription: - You can subscribe for VIP membership, It gives you 150 gems + 5000 coins every day and unlocks battle time acceleration option. - The VIP membership has three duration options: Per Week, Per Month and Per Year. 1）Weekly Subscription costs $6.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial. 2）Monthly Subscription costs $9.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial. 3）Yearly Subscription costs $99.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial. - Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. - You will be able to use premium features for the duration of the subscription. - Subscription automatically renews at the same price unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. - Subscriptions can be managed by the user and after purchase, auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's iTunes Account Settings. - No cancellation of the current subscription period is allowed. - You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the trial period to avoid being charged. Please visit https://support.apple.com/HT202039 for more information. Our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: https://www.89trillion.com/privacy.html; https://www.89trillion.com/service.html We are really happy to receive any feedback from you. If you have problem or questions about the game you can find answer in our FAQ. You can find our FAQ in the help section of the in-game settings or by this link: http://www.armyneedyou.com/support/faq Follow us: 1) Discord - https://discord.com/invite/artofwar 2) Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GameAoW/ 3) Twitter - https://twitter.com/GameAoW 4) Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/artofwar_legions/ Wish you a good time, Commander!

apps.title: Pixquare - Pixel Art Studio
apps.description: Pixquare is the #1 pixel art editor, recommended by top pixel artists, game developers, and creators worldwide! Whether you're a beginner or a pro, its simple interface and rich toolset make pixel art creation easy and fun! Download now to create game assets, animate, or simply doodle pixel art! With feedback from thousands of artists, Pixquare is designed for your best pixel art experience ever! • HIGHLIGHTS: - Support both iPads & iPhones - Highly customizable and intuitive UI with left-hand mode available - RGB and Indexed mode - Tileset/Tilemap system - Timelapse recording - Apple Pencil support: gestures, sensitivity, touch rejection - Manual & auto-save modes - Shortcut options: keyboard, gesture pad, joystick - Custom themes • VERSATILE TOOLS: - Brush: spray, pixel perfect, pressure sensitivity, contour, dithering, custom brush, jumble, blur - Eraser: pixel perfect, pressure sensitivity, dithering - Move: transformation and snapping supported - Line: straight & curve mode, perfect angle - Shape: ellipse & rectangle mode, filled, perfect ratio - Selection: 5 types & 5 modes - Color: solid/gradient fill, contiguous/non-contiguous, and more - Color picker: 4 modes (HSV, HSL, Wheel, RGB), history, drag-to-fill - All tools offer shading - Additional tools: + Color replace + Color adjustment + Outline + Text with font import capability + Custom object • LAYER/TIMELINE PANEL: - Optimized for animation & organized layers - Multi-selection, layer grouping, frame tagging, and bulk operations - Visibility and editing-lock toggle - Supports reference layers - Frame duration and cel opacity - Linked cells, onion skin, and clipping mask • ADDITIONAL FEATURES: - Symmetry tool with unlimited axes - Reference images - Color palette: save/load from Lospec, import/export, color gradient generator - Blending modes, alpha lock - Preview with a separate animation loop - Canvas rotation, Finder-like file system - Guideline • FILE IMPORT/EXPORT: - Aseprite file compatibility (importing & exporting) - GIF importing with all frames - PNG, GIF, MOV, Sprite sheet export options (layers, frames, size, and animation) - Import Photos and files as reference layers and images ------------------------------- WHY ARTISTS LOVE PIXQUARE? "Genuinely the best pixel art app for the iPad that I would recommend anyone to get!" - Jon Davies, Pixel Artist on Super House of Dead Ninjas, Binding of Isaac. "Pixquare has more than meets the eye. A seemingly simple interface that has the intuitive control you look for. The gesture pad is comparable to a desktop keypad." - Michael, Pixel Artist, Author of Pixel Logic book "I've been sharing it with basically everyone I know with an iPad because I think it's one of the best software out there for creating pixels on the iPad." - CupOhJoe, Game Developer "This is one fine app to pixel on the iPad! You can tell there's a lot of love for the craft poured in here" - Ota Jaider, Pixel Artist ------------------------------- • SCREENSHOT ARTWORK AUTHORS： - FICO (@FicoPx) - Tofu (@tofupixel.bsky.social) - Mossy (@MossyPixe) - chili (@ryviolie) - Lesma (@pixe_lesma) - ue_voxel (@UeVoxel) - TransientCode (@TransientCode) - 08games (@the08games) - Rinspirit_art(@rinspiritart.bsky.social) - natalie (@cafeaunat) ------------------------------- SUPPORT: User guide: https://docs.pixquare.art Email: info@pixquare.art Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixquare_app Website: https://www.pixquare.art/ NO SUBSCRIPTION. BUY ONCE AND ENJOY FREE UPDATES FOREVER!

apps.title: AI Painting: Generate Art Girl
apps.description: Enter text prompt, create your painting with AI technology! All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style, AI will take care of the rest, bring your ideas into a wonderful painting in seconds! Enter whatever is on your mind right now, such as Santa Claus riding a horse in universe, Futuristic City or whatever you are imagining. Then choose from a range of familiar art styles, such as Cyberpunk, Van Gogh and Oil painting, experiment with styles and see which style captures your idea best. Main Features: - Turn text into art painting Bring your ideas into a wonderful painting in seconds! Simply type in what you have on your mind, and the AI will generate wonderful painting that match your dream. - Create art from images If you have an exact concept of your painting should look like, you can add an initial image to condition the generation of new images. Upload photo, provide expected text prompt that describes the painting. You will get an unique artwork that the world has never seen before. - Generate magic avatar Create your Magic Avatar with AI technology! Just upload your photos and generate your outstanding avatar in various styles. We only give you photorealistic 4K renders, which is perfect to use for profile pictures, social media posts and even printing on paper, clothing or posters! - Countless Avatar with different styles -Countless magic avatars, such as sci-fi style, astronaut style, queen style, art painting style, epic comic-style and so on. And many more! Create anything you can think of. It's time to unleash your creativity! Automatic subscription service description - Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. - Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off 24-hours before the end of the current period. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and a renewal fee will be provided. - The unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that products. Terms of Use: https://magicpaintingios.blogspot.com/2023/03/user.html Privacy Policy: https://magicpaintingios.blogspot.com/2023/03/Privacy%20Policy.html

apps.title: TokyoArtBeat
apps.description: Tokyo Art Beat is your essential companion for exploring art and design exhibitions across Japan. Our newly unified design and enhanced features make navigating the art world simpler than ever. Free Features • Search and browse exhibitions • Filter events with precise search criteria • Find nearby art spaces with interactive maps • Access the latest news and articles Premium Features (First Month Free) • Save on museum visits with "MuPon" discounts • Track exhibitions with bookmarks and visit logs • Bookmark your favorite articles • Share your thoughts through exhibition ratings and comments • Organize events in custom lists • Plan better with email alerts and sortable map pins Seamless Integration with the Web Version • One account for both web and mobile • Access all features across platforms How to Use This App • Browse exhibitions and articles for free • Unlock all features with a premium plan (first month free) Experience Japan's vibrant art scene with Tokyo Art Beat—your personal guide to the art world.

apps.title: Mesmerizely - AI Generated Art
apps.description: Turn simple words into beautiful pieces of art. Mesmerizely allows you to turn your ideas into reality. You just need to enter any text, and our AI will create beautiful pictures ready to be shared on any social media or to be sent to your friends. *UNLIMITED IDEAS* Give our AI any idea you have, and the app will try to transform it into a beautiful piece of art. A dog in the style of Van Gogh? A cat walking on Mars? A teddy bear riding a horse in the middle of times square? Yes, all of these is possible with our AI. *MULTIPLE STYLES* You can pick any style you want for your picture. If you want a more classical look, we offer styles like Van Gogh or Picasso. For a more modern look, try our comic book or our illustration style. The possibilities are endless! *EASY SHARING TO GO VIRAL* Once you’re happy with your picture, you can easily share it on any social media platform or send it to your friends. Share your creation on Instagram Reels, Instagram Stories, Tiktok, Pinterest, Snapchat, Twitter. You will always have something cool to share and to grow and wow your audience. **RELIEVE STRESS EASILY** Creating beautiful pictures is a great way to relax and let your stress go away. Just enter any text, and our AI will do the rest. You can watch the magic happen in front of your eyes while you relax. *EASY TO USE* The app is very easy to use with many pre-made ideas where you just need to change a word to get fabulous pieces of art. With this app, you can also create your designs in an effortless way thanks to our multiple options, which are very easy to select. There are many different ways that you can use the app to express your creativity. You can use the pre-made designs as inspiration for your own creations. TRY IT NOW Download the app now, and let your imagination run wild! Terms of Use : https://mesmerizely.app/terms-of-service/

apps.title: WOMBO Dream - AI Art Generator
apps.description: Turn words into photos & beautiful digital artworks using the power of AI! All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style - and watch WOMBO Dream - AI Art Generator bring your idea to life in seconds. Do you want to create a photo, picture, drawing or painting that is your art work? WOMBO Dream - AI Art Generator is an art station for you. You can turn text into any image or photo you want. It's like magic: simply type in whatever you want Dream to paint - such as “Alien Space Station” or “Rainbow Forest” - pick a style (Realistic, VFX, Anime, Avatar, Street Art etc.) and hit create! You don’t need a paintbrush, pencil, or any art supplies to make beautiful artwork, all you need is an idea. Take a back seat and let WOMBO Dream unleash your creativity. ► Turn words into art, ask Dream to paint you: - Movie Posters - Song Lyrics - Journal Entries - Poems - Star Signs and much more! ► Explore art styles Whether you’re looking for a vibrant colourful painting or something darker and more dystopian, WOMBO Dream has you covered with an array of selected styles. ► Edit with text Customize your ai images & ai photos and adjust tiny details by writing a simple instruction. Whether you want to change the hair color, add a background, or adjust the lighting, the possibilities are endless. Create your own AI Generated Photos! ► Create art from images Start with an image as a visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select one from our library, and watch our AI transform it into a masterpiece tailored to your vision. Transform photos of your partners or bring your kids artwork to life. Enjoy your AI Generated photos & images. Art Maker & AI Portrait, Graphic Design Generator. ► Share Your Art AI Pic & Go Viral Share your art with your friends, family, or on social media to join the latest #AIArt trend. ► Get Inspired & Explore Artwork Save your artwork to your profile so that you can view it for later, it’s that simple! Get an extra boost of inspiration by browsing the public gallery of amazing images generated by AI artists from all over the world. Explore and like the ideas of others and get your creative juices flowing! ► Have AI Generated Pictures & Images Using advanced AI technology, you can turn any text into a stunning image in seconds. Whether you're looking to create a beautiful piece of art or design your own anime characters, our WOMBO Dream - AI Art Picture Generator app has got you covered. Our AI drawer and painting tools make it easy for you to create images that reflect your unique style and vision. With our art creator feature, you can experiment with different colors, textures, and patterns until you achieve the perfect look. Unleash your creativity and start making incredible images today with our WOMBO Dream - AI Generated Photo app. ► Who is WOMBO Dream? WOMBO is a Canadian artificial intelligence (AI) company transforming the future of entertainment. Creativity is at the core of human interaction, we want to enable everyone to unleash their creative potential and power next-generation media that will make people laugh and smile! With over 140+ Million app installs to date, we’re just getting started. --- Privacy Policy - https://www.w.ai/privacy-policy Terms of Use - https://www.w.ai/terms-of-service-wombo-dream

apps.title: UNICORN 3D: Color by Number
apps.description: Have you ever wondered turning 2D coloring book into 3D one? Sounds exciting? Well, welcome to the Unicorn 3D coloring by numbers - perfectly designed stress relieving coloring app as well as a fun way for all to spend free time together! In this off the chart app you can fully unleash your creativity by coloring favorite characters designed out of numerous voxels. Make a selection from a wide range of 3D coloring pages & simply follow the numbers inside the voxels to fill them with colors. Cool animated video will be generated! App features: • AR coloring mode! • User-friendly interface • Super duper collection of 3D animated voxel figures! • Stress Relieving • Professionally designed So, how about getting yourself best coloring experience ever? apps.title: Dall E: AI Art Generator
apps.description: Introducing the revolutionary new mobile app that uses the power of AI to generate stunning photos and AI art based on your input. With Pictor AI Art, you can create beautiful, unique art pieces in a matter of seconds. Wanna draw a cute kid playing with his cat or a magnificent mountainous view under sunset? Pictor AI Art is here for you. Our app uses advanced AI algorithms to analyze your input and generate stunning art pieces that are tailored to your preferences. Whether you're looking for a classic painting style or a modern, abstract look, our app has you covered. You can create art that truly reflects your personality and style. With support for a wide range of art styles, you can explore new creative possibilities and discover your own unique style: Cinematic, Fantasy, Anime, Mystical, Pen & Ink, Post Apocalyptic, Polaroid, 3D Rendering, Cyborg, Digital Art, Futuristic, Magic, Oil Painting, Cartoon, Vintage, Space, Comic, Cyberpunk & the styles of your own. Whether you're an artist looking to expand your portfolio or just someone who loves beautiful art, AI Art is the perfect tool for you. So why wait? Download our app today and start creating beautiful, unique art pieces that are sure to impress. With AI Art, the possibilities are endless! To access the premium package, the app offers different subscription plans: Monthly ($9.99), 6-Month ($29.99) and Yearly ($39.99). apps.title: Prisma: Photo Editor, Filters
apps.description: You don’t need to be an experienced photo editor to turn photos into captivating digital art. Why? Because there’s Prisma for it! With the Prisma photo editor, it’s easy to unleash the artist within and go from average photo to mesmerizing edit in seconds! Recognized as the App of the Year in 2016 Prisma has a constantly growing community of over 120 million users all over the world. Prisma provides a lot of features both for general and selfie photo editing. Download Prisma and let AI technology convert your photos into an artistic piece! FEATURES EXTENSIVE LIBRARY OF STYLES More than 500 various styles are waiting for you to be tried out in Prisma’s library. New styles are going live on a daily basis for you to spruce up your creativity. You can also try Portrait styles that are specially designed for making captivating selfies. TOP-NOTCH FUNCTIONALITY •Among the best selection of Prisma’s tools to customize your photo, it’s worth mentioning the Portrait Segmentation feature. The essential tool for selfies is set to not only add the style to the whole image but also be applied either to the person or the background separately. •Another way to enhance your photos without putting too much effort into the editing process is using vivid frames that will complement absolutely any of your photos. •And the icing on the cake — Prisma’s feature for background editing. With this tool, you can replace the background of any selfie you want! You can select the background from the colorful templates, or choose any other from your phone’s gallery. ALL THE BENEFITS IN ONE PLAN A Prisma Premium subscription gives access to any style without an exception and allows you to save photos in HD quality! Before purchasing a subscription, you can try Prisma for 3 days for FREE. You can then choose from several subscription plans that have the same set of features. The only difference is the time interval for each plan. ——————————————— Prisma Premium Subscription: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Terms of Use http://prisma-ai.com/terms Privacy Policy http://prisma-ai.com/privacy

apps.title: Dreams AI Art Generator
apps.description: Introducing Dreams AI -- The Ultimate Avatar & Art Creation App for iOS! Upload 10-20 of your selfies and let our powerful AI algorithms do the rest. Create any avatar you can imagine, from cartoon characters to aliens and everything in between, and put them in any scenario, using any art style. Imagination is your only limit... Once you're happy with your creation, share it on your favorite social media platforms and show it off to your friends and followers. PLUS... Turn your words into art in just seconds! Here's the process: 1. Enter in a few words describing the picture you want (write as much or as little as you want) 2. Choose an art style from our menu 3. Hit "Create" and share your amazing results with your friends. You're just moments away from your next masterpiece. Your friends won't know what hit them when you unleash your creativity. And if you get stuck, check out our gallery of prompts for inspiration. With Dreams AI, there are no limits besides your imagination... We can't wait to see what you create! -- Privacy Policy: appmagic.co/av/privacypolicy.html Terms of Use: appmagic.co/av/terms.html

apps.title: 4ART
apps.description: Create a forgery-proof 4ARTpassport for your artworks. Manage your artwork and its provenance. By using the 4ARTapp, the provenance of your artwork is seamlessly updated. All artwork related processes are automatically documented for you. Take a clear look at your art collection in lists or detailed views. Enjoy artworks in the virtual gallery or use VR glasses for a unique experience. Share your artworks with interested parties and lovers, assuring that images and provenance-documents are secured. Shared artworks can also be viewed at any time in the virtual gallery. Enjoy artworks selected by artists and art lovers, free of charge. You can view these published compilations of artworks also in the VR gallery. Features: Artwork registration and management: You can register artworks and manage the related data Compilation management: You can create compilations of artwork and share them with other art lovers. Authenticate registered artworks: You can forgery-proof identify registered artworks. Share artworks: You have the option to share artworks with other 4ARTapp users Transfers: Possessor change, change of location and Transfer of ownership can be fully documented with the 4ARTapp VR gallery: With the VR Gallery you have the opportunity to view artworks on a virtual tour. Discovery Mode: Your registered artworks are recognized and the related information is provided to you Employee management: You have the option of letting other people work on your behalf. Services that are available to you, free of charge are, the sharing of artworks and compilations, the VR Gallery and the change of location and ownership. Paid services include the registration and authentication of artworks, the documentation of a transfer of ownership, as well as the loan.

apps.title: April - Oil Painting by Number
apps.description: Color by number app that is completely unique - color with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to color from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of a paint by number app and more! Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the app! WHY USE APRIL ● We know you appreciate coloring activities and probably you are using plenty of other coloring apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way coloring feels. Just download the app and check it out yourself! ● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main coloring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the color number needed. ● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more coloring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun! ● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim it regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed! ● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the coloring evergreen! ● April Coloring is highly optimized for Apple Pencil. Check all the features that you can benefit from - including pressure and angle sensitivity / double tapping and more! People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of coloring – with over 1 000 000 paintings painted each month! Join them! If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com ___________________ SUBSCRIPTION INFO By subscribing, ​you get unlimited access to all premium (marked with diamond) and locked (marked with padlock) paintings. GOOD TO KNOW ● You can subscribe to a monthly plan (starting at $9.99, billed once a month). Availability and pricing of subscription plans may vary. ● The payment will be charged to your iTunes Account when you confirm the purchase. ● The subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original plan unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. ● Free trial automatically converts to a paid subscription unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the trial period. From that point onwards, subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. ● You can cancel the subscription or the free trial anytime via the subscription setting through your iTunes account (go to your device settings and tap iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > enter the password > Subscriptions > Assembly > Cancel Subscription button at the bottom). Do it at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. Learn more: http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 ● Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases an April subscription. Terms of Service: http://www.aprilcoloringapp.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.aprilcoloringapp.com/privacy-policy/
